svcproc.title: Service Procedure
svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 6 for all item numbers in parentheses.

step1.para: Prior to assembly, lubricate all o-rings, seals, and pistons, as well as body bores, using the lubricant provided with the maintenance kit.

Install the valve retainer (Item 20, Figure 6 ) on the inlet and exhaust valve (Item 19) so that the flange of the retainer (Item 20) surrounds the rubber portion of the valve. Install the inlet and exhaust valve in the body (Item 18).
Install the inlet and exhaust valve return spring (Item 21) in the body (Item 18).

Install the large and small diameter o-rings (Items 22 and 23) in the exhaust cover (Item 24), then install the exhaust cover in the body (Item 18) taking care not to damage the o-rings. Hold the exhaust cover in place.
While depressing the exhaust cover (Item 24), install the retaining ring (Item 25) in the body (Item 18). Make certain the retainer (Item 25) is fully seated in its groove in the body.
If the AR-1 was equipped with a relay piston return spring (Item 17), install the spring in the body, large diameter first.
Using lubricant to hold them in place, install sealing ring (Item 14) on the cover (Item 7).
Install the o-ring (Item 15) on the relay piston (Item 16), then install the piston in the body (Item18).

After noting the relationship marks made prior to disassembly, assemble the cover (Item 7) on the body (Item 18) and the mounting bracket on the body (Item 18) and secure the components together using the two capscrews (Item 5) and two bolts (Item 4), lockwashers (Item 6), and nuts (Item 10). Torque the cover capscrews (Item 5) and bolts (Item 4) to 120 - 150 in-lbs.
Install the two capscrews and lockwashers (Item 8) that secure the bracket to the cover (Item 7) and torque them to 180 - 220 in-lbs.

After noting the relationship of marks made prior to disassembly, attach the gasket (Item 3) to the antilock controller then secure the antilock controller on the cover (Item 7) using the four capscrews and lockwashers (Item 1). Torque the capscrews to 50 - 80 in-lbs.
Install all air line fittings and plugs making certain thread sealing material does not enter the valve.
Install the CR-15 (AR-1 with attached antilock controller) on the vehicle and perform the and before returning the vehicle to service.
